text.div:
ProstateRadTumourType

Indicates the radical prostatectomy tumour type.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta--prostate-rad-tumour-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
acinar_variant Adenocarcinoma (Acinar variant eg, foamy, pseudohyperplastic)Adenocarcinoma (Acinar variant eg, foamy, pseudohyperplastic)
prostatic_ductal_adenocarcinoma Prostatic ductal adenocarcinomaProstatic ductal adenocarcinoma

name: ProstateRadTumourType
description: Indicates the radical prostatectomy tumour type.
